column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " Waterbenders deal with the flow of energy .
#Text=" Iroh says : " If you let the energy in your own body flow , the lightning will follow it .
#Text=You must create a pathway from your fingertips , up your arm to your shoulder , then down into your stomach .
#Text=The stomach is the source of energy in your body .
#Text=It is called the sea of chi .
#Text=Only in my case it is more like a vast ocean .
#Text=From the stomach , you direct it up again , and out the other arm .
#Text=The stomach detour is critical .
#Text=You must not let the lightning pass through your heart , or the damage could be deadly .
#Text=You may wish to try a physical motion , to get a feel for the pathways ' flow , like this .
#Text=Now , are you focusing your energy ?
#Text=Can you feel your own chi flowing in , down , up , and out ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I think so .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Come on , you 've got to feel the flow .
#Text=Excellent !
#Text=You 've got it !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Great , I 'm ready to try it with real lightning !
#Text=" Iroh says : " What , are you crazy ?
#Text=Lightning is very dangerous !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I thought that was the point !
#Text=You teaching me to protect myself from it !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yeah !
#Text=But I 'm not going to shoot lightning at you !
#Text=If you 're lucky , you will never have to use this technique at all !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , if you wo n't help me , I 'll find my own lightning .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey there , we found your cub !
#Text=See , we have no problem with you !
#Text=We 're friendly !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , this is bad , you 've got to get me out of here !
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is really bad !
#Text=Please Aang , you have to earthbend me out , there 's no other way !
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh no !
#Text=Woo - hoo , look at me !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Please , do n't leave me again .
#Text=" Aang says : " I wo n't .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What are you doing here ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Just enjoying the show .
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=You were there the whole time ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Pretty much .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why did n't you do something ?
#Text=Sokka was in trouble !
#Text=I was in trouble !
#Text=You could have gotten him out and helped us get away !
#Text=" Toph says : " Guess it just did n't occur to me .
#Text=" Aang says : " Enough !
#Text=I want my staff back !
#Text=" Toph says : " Do it now !
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Earthbend , Twinkle Toes .
#Text=You just stood your ground against a crazy beast .
#Text=And even more impressive , you stood your ground against me .
#Text=You 've got stuff .
#Text=" Aang says : " But – " Toph says : " Do it !
#Text=" Toph says : " You did it !
#Text=You 're an earthbender .
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't believe it !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Awww , this is a really wonderful , touching moment .
#Text=So could you get me out of here so I can give you both a big , snuggly hug ?
#Text=" Aang says : " No problem , Sokka !
#Text=" Toph says : " Actually , you should probably let me do that .
#Text=You 're still a little new to this .
#Text=You might accidentally crush him .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , no crushing , please .
#Text=" Katara says : " You found him !
#Text=" Sokka says : " The whole time , I was in that hole , not knowing if I was going to live or die .
#Text=It makes a man to think about what 's really important .
#Text=I realized – " Aang says : " Hey Katara , look what I can do !
#Text=" Katara says : " You did it !
#Text=I knew you would !
#Text=You tried the positive reinforcement , did n't you ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Yep , it worked wonders .
#Text=" Aang says : " Appa , Appa , I can earthbend now !
#Text=The key is being completely rooted .
#Text=Physically and mentally unmovable !
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 've always thrown everything you could at me !
#Text=Well , I can take it , and now I can give it back !
#Text=Come on , strike me !
#Text=You 've never held back before !

#Text=" Main Aang Appa Foo Foo Cuddlypoops Iroh Katara Momo Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Saber - tooth moose lion mother says : " Minor Lu Ten ( Iroh 's dream only ) " Earth Kingdom soldier says : " Come on , spider snake - eyes !
#Text=Ha !
#Text=Ha !
#Text=Yeah !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Could I get some water , a bag of feed and something hot to eat ?
#Text=" Store owner says : " Not enough here for a hot meal .
#Text=I can get you two bags of feed .
#Text=" Earth Kingdom soldier says : " Ow !
#Text=" Gow says : " Hey !
#Text=You throwing eggs at us , stranger ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " No .
#Text=" Gow says : " You see who did throw it ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " No .
#Text=" Earth Kingdom soldier says : " That your favorite word , no ?
#Text=" Gow says : " Egg had to come from somewhere .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Maybe a chicken flew over .
#Text=" Gow says : " Thanks for your contribution .
#Text=The army appreciates your support .
#Text=You better leave town .
#Text=Penalty for stayin 's a lot steeper than you can afford , stranger .
#Text=Trust me .
#Text=" Store owner says : " Those soldiers are supposed to protect us from the Fire Nation .
#Text=But they 're just a bunch of thugs .
#Text=" Lee says : " Thanks for not ratting me out !
#Text=" Lee says : " I 'll take you to my house and feed your ostrich horse for you .
#Text=Come on , I owe you !
#Text=" Lee says : " No one can ever sneak up on us .
#Text=" Zuko says : " No kidding .
#Text=" Gansu says : " You a friend of Lee 's ?
#Text=" Lee says : " This guy just stood up to the soldiers !
#Text=By the end , he practically had them running away !
#Text=" Sela says : " Does this guy have a name ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm ... uh ... " Gansu says : " He does n't have to say who he is if he does n't want to , Sela .
#Text=Anyone who can hold his own against those bully soldiers is welcome here .
#Text=Those men should be ashamed to wear Earth Kingdom uniforms .
#Text=" Sela says : " The real soldiers are off fighting the War , like Lee 's big brother Sensu .
#Text=Supper 's going to be ready soon .
#Text=Would you like to stay ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I ca n't .
#Text=I should be moving on .
#Text=" Sela says : " Gansu could use some help on the barn .
#Text=Why do n't you two work for a while , and then we 'll eat .
#Text=" Lee says : " You do n't seem like you 're from around here .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Mm-mm .
#Text=" Lee says : " Where are you from then ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Far away .
#Text=" Lee says : " Ohhh .
#Text=Where are you going ?
#Text=" Gansu says : " Lee , give it a rest .
#Text=Stop asking the man personal questions , got it ?
#Text=" Lee says : " Yes .
#Text=So how 'd you get that scar ?
#Text=" Gansu says : " It 's not nice to bother people about things they might not want to talk about .
#Text=A man 's past is his business .
#Text="
